## **MSc**

In 2015, I graduated *summa cum laude* from the Erasmus Mundus Master Programme in Evolutionary Biology ([MEME](https://www.evobio.eu/)), obtaining a double degree from the [University of Groningen](https://www.rug.nl/) in the Netherlands (supervised by [Dr Ido Pen](https://www.rug.nl/staff/i.r.pen/)) and [Uppsala University](https://www.uu.se/en/) in Sweden (jointly supervised by [Dr Claus Rueffler](https://katalog.uu.se/profile/?id=N13-2069) and [Dr Simone Immler](https://simoneimmler.com/)).

# BSc

I got my undergraduate degree in Biology in 2013 from the [University of Lisbon](https://www.ulisboa.pt/en), in my home country of Portugal. I specialized in Evolutionary and Developmental Biology.
